sense.def:
To yield to someone or something
pomeni, da se nehamo upirati komu ali čemu;

seg.quote: He was yielding to public pressure.

sense.def:
To yield something
pomeni, da dovolimo, da kdo drug prevzame del nadzora ali odgovornosti, ki smo jo doslej imeli mi.

seg.quote: He will not yield even a limited measure of editorial control.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
yields
, se zlomi ali premakne zaradi uporabe sile ali pritiska teže.

seg.quote: Any lock will yield to brute force.

sense.def:
Kadar preiskava ali razprava
yields a particular result or information
, privede do določenega rezultata ali podatkov.

seg.quote: Talks between the two sides yielded no results.

sense.def:
Kadar neko območje ali število živali
yields a particular amount of food
, na tistem zemljišču ali s tistim številom živali pridelamo določeno količino hrane.

seg.quote: 0.23 acres yields only 200 pounds of rice.

sense.def:
A yield
je količina hrane, ki jo pridelamo na določenem zemljišču ali z določenim številom živali.

seg.quote: They have a far better yield than any farm round here.

sense.def:
Kadar davek ali naložba
yields an amount of money or profit
, prinese določeno vsoto denarja ali dobiček.
